availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Gowin (Anderson County and Franklin County laborer)

body.p: Residence: Anderson County, Kentucky and then Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born laborer. Son of Lewis and Lucretia Gowin.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, Frankfort post office, p. 77.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 443.
